sentences.en: a financial crisis of mammoth proportions
Building the new railroad will be a mammoth job.
sentences.cn: 修建那条新铁路将是一项巨大工程.

sentences.en: By comparison, the Great Wall in China is a mammoth presence.
sentences.cn: 相比之下, 中国的长城真是个庞然大物.

sentences.en: Cold the blue Pacific water, when the mammoth mountain blooms.
sentences.cn: 蓝色的太平洋海水变得冰冷, 猛犸山脉的花却在盛开.

sentences.en: I can't wait to get my claws in that mammoth.

sentences.en: Mammoth Hot Springs is at the nnorthern entrance to the park.
sentences.cn: 猛犸热泉是通向公园北部的入口.

sentences.en: Partial remains of five mastodons, three Ice Age bison and a juvenile Columbian mammoth, as well as plant matter and insects, have also been found.
sentences.cn: 同时发现的还有五头乳齿象、三头冰河期野牛和一只少年哥伦比亚猛犸象的遗骸，以及植物和昆虫。

sentences.en: Reforming the prison system would be a mammoth task.
sentences.cn: 改革监狱制度将是一项巨大的任务。

sentences.en: The mammoth has now been restored in the Palaeontological Museum in Leningrad.
sentences.cn: 这只长毛象现在在列宁格勒的古生物学博物馆修复了.

sentences.en: The mammoth has now just a suburb of Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 这头长毛象已被修复,现存于圣彼得堡古生物学博物馆.

sentences.en: The problem is beginning to assume mammoth proportions.
sentences.cn: 这个问题开始显得十分重大.

sentences.en: They knew the mammoth because they have left us strikingly effective pictures of that creature.
sentences.cn: 他们熟悉猛犸,因为他们留下的那种动物的画像令我们印象深刻.

sentences.en: This book has unfolded the millennium latter mammoth humanity interspace epic poem!
sentences.cn: 本书展现了千年后一场波澜壮阔的人类星际史诗!

sentences.en: This tiny mammoth's body was found in May of 2007.
sentences.cn: 这头长毛象的小小躯体在2007年五月为人发现.

sentences.en: Which is always a tremendous task, dear friends — a mammoth task.
sentences.cn: 她的这种工作永远是一项巨大的工程, 亲爱的朋友们,是一项无比巨大的工程!

words.tran_cn: 长毛象；[古生]猛犸象；庞然大物

trans.tran_en: an animal like a large hairy  elephant  that lived on Earth thousands of years ago
